tool_description: Maps subject terms to controlled vocabularies including Library of Congress Subject Headings, Getty AAT, and custom thesauri.

input_terms.description: Subject terms to map to controlled vocabularies

vocabulary_source.description: Target vocabulary: lcsh, getty_aat, mesh, local_thesaurus

match_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for automatic matching (0.5-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid vocabulary source: Use lcsh, getty_aat, mesh, or local_thesaurus
Empty input terms: Provide at least one subject term to map
Invalid match threshold: Threshold must be between 0.5 and 1.0
Vocabulary service unavailable: Unable to connect to controlled vocabulary service
usage: Provide input_terms and vocabulary_source. Adjust match_threshold to control mapping sensitivity. Returns both exact and suggested matches with confidence scores.

unmapped_terms.description: Terms with no suitable matches found
